00019 template<class T>
00020 unsigned int Crc32<T>::crc(const UPTree<T>& tree) const
00021 {
00022   unsigned int i, j, k;
00023   unsigned char* p;
00024   unsigned int  len = tree.size() * sizeof(T);
00025   TreeTok<T> tok;
00026   
00027   // preload shift register, per CRC-32 spec
00028   unsigned int crc = 0xffffffff;  
00029 
00030   for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00031   {
00032     k = (len - i) % sizeof(T);
00033     j = -1 + (len - i) / sizeof(T);
00034     if (k)
00035       ++j;
00036     
00037     tok = tree[j];
00038     tok.setFlag(false);
00039     
00040     p = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(&tok);
00041     p += sizeof(T) - k - 1;
00042 
00043     crc = (crc << 8) ^ _table[(crc >> 24) ^ *p];
00044   }
00045   
00046   // transmit complement, per CRC-32 spec
00047   return ~crc;    
00048 }
00049 
00055 template<class T>
00056 Crc32<T>::Crc32()
00057 {
00058  int i, j;
00059  unsigned int c;
00060 
00061   for (i = 0; i < 256; ++i) 
00062   {
00063     for (c = i << 24, j = 8; j > 0; --j)
00064       c = c & 0x80000000 ? (c << 1) ^ 0x04c11db7 : (c << 1);
00065     _table[i] = c;
00066   }
00067 }
